org.cyclops.evilcraft.api.degradation

Interface IDegradationRegistry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DegradationRegistry

    public interface IDegradationRegistry
extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry
    Interface for the degradation registry.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • registerDegradationEffect

        void registerDegradationEffect(java.lang.String nameID,
                               IDegradationEffect degradationEffect,
                               int weight)
        Register a new degradation effect.
        Parameters:
        nameID - The unique name of this effect.
        degradationEffect - The effect to register.
        weight - The weight that this effect can occur.

      • getDegradationEffects

        java.util.Set<IDegradationEffect> getDegradationEffects()
        Get all the registered degradation effects.
        Returns:
        The registered effects.

      • getRandomDegradationEffect

        IDegradationEffect getRandomDegradationEffect()
        Get a degradation effect based on a weighted random choice.
        Returns:
        A weighted random effect.
